title: Chili Lake
about: Chili Lake is located in Mtskheta-Mtianeti region, Mtskheta municipality, in the village of Telovani, a few kilometers from the Mukhatgverdi cemetery, at 1130 meters above sea level. If you can't go on long hikes and you are looking for a beautiful place near Tbilisi, you will really like Lake Chili for relax in nature. The lake is beautiful all seasons, hidden in the green, painted in autumn colors or wrapped in winter whiteness. Lake Chili freezes in winter so you can walk on the ice. Fishing enthusiasts also visit this place often. Here you can have picnic or a small hike. On the way you will enjoy the beautiful views of Tbilisi and the Caucasus. Lake Chili is especially popular in the summer. The road goes to the lake, but it is possible to come only by off-road vehicle. You can also take a bus to Mukhatgverdi Cemetery and then continue on foot.
